channel.title: Route on Nomad Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Route on Nomad Blog

item.title: The Plan
item.description: Alright, so here I am. Sitting in my flat in Hamburg. What should one do with life? There’s so many fascinating things to do, but one of them seems to beat all others: travel! For uncountably many years (okay, not that many, but quite a few) I have known that travelling is one of my most favourite pastimes. I have done a few trips, from three-week excursions to China to nine-month travel-and-work trips to Australia, and each and every time I came to love the freedom that travelling brings.
